description.0: This polearm was once cherished by a member of the old nobility that governed Mondstadt long ago. Although it has never seen the light of day, it is still incomparably sharp.

0.0: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by <cryo>8%</cryo>. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

1.0: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by <cryo>10%</cryo>. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

2.0: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by <cryo>12%</cryo>. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

3.0: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by <cryo>14%</cryo>. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

4.0: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by <cryo>16%</cryo>. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.
